entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
